original_title: Into the Future: On the Preservation of Knowledge in the Electronic Age
overview: The future of preservation is at stake in the digital age. Into the Future explores the hidden crisis of the digital information age. Will digitally stored information and knowledge survive into the future? Will humans twenty, fifty, one hundred years from now have access to the electronically recorded history of our time?
title: Into the Future: On the Preservation of Knowledge in the Electronic Age
